Name: SLA
Review Text: Must-go place if you are a vegan/vegetarian. Loved the salad bowls here.

Name: SLA
Review Text: A good set of healthy options in the city center. Salad bowls are quite big and reasonably priced (in between 8 and 12 EUR). Service is fast, food is tasty - I'm definitely coming here again. Cards are accepted. Outside seating is available most of the year.

Name: SLA
Review Text: SLA is an organic salad bar where you are guaranteed to walk out the door full of energy.  Color on your plate equals high nutrition. ‚Ä¶

Name: SLA
Review Text: Very nice and cozy place, small and intimate with very good healthy food and many vegan options. Location is very good, what makes it a good alternative for vegan people in the city center. Notice that the place is rather small, so better to come before rush hour.

Name: SLA
Review Text:
They have a big variety of different salads but you can also create your own.
The ingredients are fresh and the salads (I had the hummus/chickpeas one) taste very delicious. ‚Ä¶

Name: SLA
Review Text: Healthy, Tasty and Good price. Nice relaxed vibe. Best matcha latte i have ever had. The prices are quite reasonable for the amount and quality of the food. The staff is also very friendly.

Name: SLA
Review Text: Very fresh and healthy option of bowls and salads. The portion sizes are really filling at a very fair price and great service.

Name: SLA

Name: SLA
Review Text: Well, if you are looking for some warm food this is definitely not the place. But apart from this the place is cool. Food is good. Coffee is strong. Helpful staffs and laughing at each other loudly which I find good. It means they enjoy working there. ;)

Name: SLA
Review Text: Amazing selection of vegetarian options! The falafel bowl was super yummy!

Name: SLA
Review Text: Delicious, filling, and healthy! Lots of terrific options for food and drink that actually make you feel great. The staff were very helpful and very friendly. They also had our gluten-free and vegan requirements covered no problem!

Name: SLA
Review Text: Had a fabulous vegan meal here. Large portions of fresh veg plus sources hummus and falafel. One of us had the avocado and hummus bowl and one had the spicy falafel bowl. Water is free. We went on a Tuesday evening and sat upstairs. There ‚Ä¶

Name: SLA
Review Text: Polite and patient service on a very busy, warm evening. A guy before us in the queue was very rude but the staff responded (too) kindly and professionally. ‚Ä¶

Name: SLA
Review Text: Lovely healthy wholesome food, even my son loved it his create your own bowl. Pulled oats was a firm favourite by all of us. My coffee latte with oat milk was the nicest coffee we had in Amsterdam!

Name: SLA
Review Text: Brilliant vegetarian and vegan salad restaurant. The salads are huge, but absolutely delicious, and on top of that they're excellent value for money. Even if one is an avid meat eater I can definitely still recommend this place for a healthy meal out. Would love to go again and would love to steal their cookery book!

Name: SLA
Review Text: Great for you if you're vegan, vegetarian or just looking for a healthy meal. The staff is really nice and helpful, the food choice is quite diverse and the interior arrangement is amazing with multitude of plants and minimalistic furniture. Fun place to lunch with your friends!

Name: SLA
Review Text: Quick, fresh, healthy, and affordable. Also the seating area is always clean and cute with hanging plants. I've been to two locations during this trip to Amsterdam, and both times I made a create-your-own salad for ‚Ç¨8.50. It includes a ‚Ä¶

Name: SLA
Review Text: a very nice place with big portions, good ingredients, interesting flavours. they never go for dull flavours. dressings are always creative and not common. judging from the  meals I ever had here, you will not stay hungry after a salad from SLA :)

Name: SLA
Review Text: Ah, what can i tell about this place. Excellent is an understatement may be. I've been there many times. Almost everything on their  menu is worth trying. Their food is absolutely fresh and the products are carefully selected. Their ‚Ä¶

Name: SLA
Review Text: Great place to eat a healthy meal!

Name: SLA
Review Text: Amazing spot if you are looking for a healthy place to eat. They offer a really good variety of vegetables ,dressings but you also have meat options. It has beautiful interiors and great attention to the environment (there is no plastic and the water is free). The staff is really kind and ready to explain everything.

Name: SLA
Review Text: So today I finally went to SLA and had the smoked tofu bowl/salad/whatever. It was absolutely amazing, very tasty and nutricious. They have options for many types of diets including vegetarian or vegan, which are marked on their menu. This bowl was vegan!

Name: SLA
Review Text: Got two bowls to go, both giant and amazingly delicious. Protein bowl was my favorite by far! Excellent selection of quality vegetables and *protein* which I found harder to find in other vegan places in Amsterdam.

Name: SLA
Review Text:
[VEGAN and FODMAP friendly!]

Name: SLA

Name: SLA
Review Text: If you want to avoid the usual burger, pizza, fish'n'chips options, and would like something fresh and healthy, at a reasonable price, this is the place for you. As for the reviewer complaining about lack of meat choices, I guess he doesn't get out much, and has missed the vegetarian concept.

Name: SLA
Review Text: Little place, the ambience is really calm and good, you can choose your own salad ingredients or choose a made salad. The ingredients are all good and tasty. In my opinion it‚Äôs a really good place

Name: SLA
Review Text: Great concept and healthy food.  Friendly staff.  Only small critic is that I didn't think the ingredients in my half warm bowl fully harmonized. I'll take a different one next time.

Name: SLA
Review Text: Enormous portions of great salads! If you're lazy to cook for the day, get your lunch here and you'll still have leftovers for the dinner (:

Review Text: I stopped here with my wife before going to a movie. The selection is really nice but I didn't give five stars because of their limited selection of meat. They only had chicken. Everything else was nice.

Name: SLA

Name: SLA
Review Text: Fantastic food. Protein Greens was exactly what I needed after a few weeks traveling in a country with limited options like these. Great staff, cool environment. #ilovesla!

Name: SLA
Review Text: Superbe salads and other tasty food. The oat bread is heavenly good. It's small but totally worth waiting for a seat. Staff is friendly and helpful.

Name: SLA
Review Text: Food is in this sla outstanding as well as the coffee. Only a pity that the lightning is lacking. Bulbs are replaced with the wrong type (color) that does not compliment the interior nor your foot eating beneath it.

Name: SLA
Review Text: We loved it so much that we ate there two days un a row. Fresh, tasty and very filling bowls at affordable prices.

Name: SLA
Review Text: Very good choice of salad and vegetables. Nice portions so you get full. Nice ambient, very cute calm place.

Name: SLA
Review Text: Fresh and nutritious salads, plenty of options for vegans too. In dinnertime it's difficult to find a seat, but you can always take it to go.

Review Text: Lovely place to eat delicious salads at good prices, not a vegan or vegetarian myself so would have liked to have the option of meat or fish but I guess the place is specifically targeted at that audience
